import React, { useState } from "react"; import LoginAPI from "./LoginAPI"; import Dashboard from "./Dashboard"; import "../styles/Template.css"; export default function Template(ac) { const [switchLoginAPI, setswitchLoginAPI] = useState(false); console.log("Template -> switchLoginAPI", switchLoginAPI); const [switchDashboard, setswitchDashboard] = useState(true); console.log("Template -> switchDashboard", switchDashboard); const routeLoginAPI = () => { setswitchLoginAPI(true); setswitchDashboard(false); }; const routeDashboard = () => { setswitchDashboard(true); setswitchLoginAPI(false); }; return (
